original_title: Hans Christian Andersen Animated Classics: The Ugly Duckling
overview: The Ugly Duckling is the heart-warming, and sometimes heart-wrenching, story of a little "ugly" duckling. Ridiculed and laughed at, the Ugly Duckling leaves his home and journeys through the world, searching for a place to belong. But after a lonely and cold winter, the duckling is transformed and shows his true feathers as he discovers how being different can be beautiful.
title: Hans Christian Andersen Animated Classics: The Ugly Duckling
